Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.util

Interface Summary
EventsObserver Observer of sdk events
 

Class Summary
BaseActivityInstrumentationTestCase<T extends Activity> Super class to activity tests
EventsListenerQueue This tracks activity events using a queue, allowing for tests to wait for certain events to turn up.
EventsListenerQueue.BlockForEvent  
EventsObservable This allows other classes (primarily test classes) to register & receive events generated by the sdk.
EventsObservable.Event  
ForceAppInstrumentationTestCase Super class for tests of an application using the Salesforce Mobile SDK
HybridInstrumentationTestCase Super class for tests of hybrid application
LogUtil Helper methods for logging
NativeInstrumentationTestCase Super class for tests of native application
